description.narrative: The Project Development Objectives (PDO) are to improve the quality and relevance of training at priority Industrial Training Institutes (ITIs) and to increase the number of labor-market-relevant workers through short-term training in Uttarakhand.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Contractors' Environmental Compliance | Description :The GoUK to ensure that each contract under the Projectincludes the obligation of the relevant contractor to comply with the relevant Safeguard Documents applicable to the respectiveactivities commissioned/awarded pursuant to said contract. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Displaced Persons | Description :The GoUK to ensure that: (a) the activities financed under the Project do notgive rise to Displaced Persons; (b) any land acquisition required for the Project be procured on a willing-buyer/willing-sellerbasis or obtained as a voluntary donation/bequest; and (c) any expenditures associated with such acquisition be financedexclusively out of GoUK'€™s own resources. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Environmental Management Plans | Description :The GoUK to ensure that, prior to initiating any activity underthe Project: (a) such activity shall have been screened in accordance with the EMF; and (b) any EMP required as per such screeningshall have been prepared and publicly disclosed, in local language(s) at the Project sites. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Environmental and Gender Specialists | Description :The GoUK to hire and thereafter maintain an environmentalspecialist and a gender specialist with experience and qualification acceptable to the Bank, under terms of reference acceptable tothe Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Government Permits/Clearances | Description :The GoUK to ensure that, prior to commencing any civil works underthe Project: (i) all necessary governmental permits and clearances for such civil works shall have been obtained; and (ii) allpre-construction conditions imposed by the governmental authority/ies hall have been complied with/fulfilled. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Grievance Redress Mechanism | Description :The GoUK to maintain and operate a grievance redress mechanism forthe handling of any stakeholder complaint arising out of the implementation of Project activities. The operation and procedures ofthe grievance redress mechanism shall be subject to protocols and guidelines acceptable to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Independent Verification Agent | Description :The GoUK to engage one or more verification agents, withexperience and qualification in the relevant technical fields acceptable to the Bank, under terms of reference agreed with theBank, to monitor, audit, analyze and/or verify the achievement/fulfillment of the DLIs/DLRs. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Priority ITIs' Principals | Description :The GoUK to select and thereafter maintain suitable and experiencedcandidates with qualifications acceptable to the Bank, to fill in all vacancies for principals in priority ITIs, and/or immediatelyfill in any arising vacancy within three months. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Plan | Description :The GoUK to prepare and adopt a Project Implementation Plan (PIP)satisfactory to the Bank, and thereafter implement, and cause UKSDM to implement, the Project in accordance with such ProjectImplementation Plan. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguard Documents | Description :The GoUK to carry out the Project in accordance/compliance with the EA&EMF,the SSDP and the GESI Guidelines, as well as the EMP prepared in accordance therewith (the Safeguard Documents), all in a mannerand substance satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards M&E Protocol, and mid-term & end-term reviews | Description :The GoUK to: (i) maintain monitoring andevaluation protocols and record keeping procedures adequate to supervise and assess the implementation of/compliance with theSafeguard Documents as well as the achievement of the objectives; and (ii) furnish to the Bank a mid-term and end-term safeguardreports to be prepared by the SPIU, in a manner and substance satisfactory to the Bank, evaluating the general compliance with theSafeguard Documents, the social and environmental impact of Project activities, and the results of the mitigation orbenefit-enhancing measures applied thereto, during the period preceding the date of each such reports. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :State Project Implementation Unit | Description :The GoUK to maintain: (i) a State Project Implementation Unit(SPIU) within Department of Skill Development and Employment (DSDE) with staff, resources, functions and competencies acceptable tothe Bank, for the carrying out the day-to-day implementation of the activities under Component 1 and 3 of the Project; and (ii) ingood standing and operation, the Uttarakhand Skills Development Mission (UKSDM) with staff and resources acceptable to the Bank forpurposes of carrying out the activities under Component 2 of the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Steering Committee | Description :The Government of Uttarakhand (GoUK) to establish and thereafter maintain aSteering Committee to provide overall policy and implementation guidance to the SPIU in the carrying out of the Project, includingreviewing and approving the annual budgets for the SPIU and the UKSDM and monitoring the progress in Project implementation. TheSteering Committee shall meet, at least, twice a year. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Training Providers | Description :For purpose of Component 2 of the Project, the GoUK, acting through UKSDM,shall: (i) enter into performance agreements with private training providers, under terms and conditions agreed with the Bank andset forth in the Project Implementation Plan, whereby these training providers shall provide Short Term Training to eligiblestudents (as defined in the Project Implementation Plan) at a pre-agreed capitation fee to be paid on the basis of their trainingperformance/success. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
